alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 03 at 6:15AM CDT until April 03 at 6:45AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CHOCTAW...NORTHWESTERN WASHINGTON AND WAYNE COUNTIES... At 614 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles west of Waynesboro, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Waynesboro, Chatom, Clara, Millry, Buckatunna and Silas. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CDT for southwestern Alabama...and southeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
